subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: D. J. Augustin scored a career-high 29 points and outplayed the rookie point guard Derrick Rose, and the undermanned Charlotte Bobcats ended a seven-game losing streak.
snippet: D. J. Augustin scored a career-high 29 points and outplayed the rookie point guard Derrick Rose, and the undermanned Charlotte Bobcats ended a seven-game losing streak.
